name: Sway Hop
description:
Hop and sway away from the spike hammers!

It's simple, hop around the screen and collect gems! Just make sure not to get hit by the spike hammers.

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap on either side of the screen to move whichever way you need while collecting gems to earn points. Double tap on the sides to double hop.

If you like the music then listen to it here: https://spinrilla.com/ug_dygzy

Available now on:

Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/sway-hop/757466

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.euingee.swayhop
